      y - Number of colored areas in y-direction
      pSize - Side length of a colored area in pixels
      title - Window title
      palette - The palette of used colors

  • Method Details

    • colorize

      public void colorize​(int x, int y, int color)
      Sets the point(x,y) to the specified color of the color palette
      Parameters:
      x - Number of colored areas in x-direction
      y - Number of colored areas in y-direction
      color - Color value

    • finished

      public boolean finished()
      Returns:
      true, if the number of colorize calls is equal or greater as the number of points

    • hasColor

      public boolean hasColor​(int x, int y)
      checks, whether a point has an assigned color or not
      Parameters:
      x - Number of colored areas in x-direction
      y - Number of colored areas in y-direction
      Returns:
      true, if the the point (x,y) already has a color

    • getX

      public int getX()
      Returns:
      Number of points in x-direction

    • getY

      public int getY()
      Returns:
      Number of points in y-direction

    • show

      public static void show​(java.awt.Color[][] array, java.lang.String title)
      To display the pixel image in a separate window
      Parameters:
      array - The pixels of the window
      title - Title of the new window
